extendedInfo.description: Pioneering news since 1850, The free Deseret News apps for Android devices are the latest innovation to bring the news you trust right to you fingertips.Elegant navigation gets you right to the news that matters most. Beautiful photos and a clean story layout create a rich digital reading experience equally perfect for sit-back Sunday mornings or the train ride to work. And lightening-fast content loading means more time reading and less time watching spinning icons.Product Features:â¢ Best of the Deseret News - A selection of the top stories from the Deseret News. Sort by most recent and most popular.â¢ Elegant Interface - Simple navigation and an intuitive touch interface bring stories to you in just a couple taps of the finger.â¢ Great Sit-Back Reading Experience - Maximum reading space and "swipe-through" story navigation makes for a compelling sit-back reading experience.â¢ Section Scanner - Scan all the most recent news in an instant and go directly to the stories that interest you most.Social Sharing - Share stories via email, Twitter and Facebook.â¢ Rapid Loading - No need to wait for stories and photos to load forever.â¢ Unique Voices - Easy access to your favorite Deseret News personalities.â¢ Offline reading mode - Read the most recently downloaded stories and see full photo galleries when offline.

reviews.comment: Functionality is way, way too limited.   In particular, there is no ability to read comments or make comments.   Comments are one of the best thing about newspapers moving online.  It allows the community to correct misinformation, expand on viewpoints, and have conversations.  I don\'t see much of a point in reading an article with no commenting checks or balances.  That makes the mobile app basically useless for me.
reviews.author: Doug Bayless

reviews.title: Data Hog
reviews.comment: Don\'t use over network. Top 5 data hog and rarely used.
reviews.author: Jeff Price

reviews.title: Slow and clunky
reviews.comment: Takes way to long to refresh. By the time it refreshes I have had to turn my phone back on 2 or 3 times.
reviews.author: Stacey Haws

reviews.title: D news reigns supreme
reviews.comment: Content that is informative yet interestingly written.
reviews.author: Mark Larson

reviews.title: Decent, but clunky
reviews.comment: It\'s a decent enough app if you need to access the Deseret News content specifically, but it\'s quite slow to load (took nearly a full minute the first time!), and has crashed twice in the past 15 minutes.  It\'s intuitive enough to read through articles, but it\'s missing some features that most news apps have.  If it stops crashing, I\'ll continue using it, but - so far it\'s been somewhat aggravating and I will likely try another news app.
reviews.author: Dave Schwan

reviews.title: Thanks!
reviews.comment: Incredible! I\'ve been waiting a long time for this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK for basic news
reviews.comment: Not all categories available. When trying to check local sports the app just launched my browser. I can do that myself. Makes the app pointless.
reviews.author: Gregor Dzierzon

reviews.title: Excellent on the tablet
reviews.comment: Finally an excellent app written for a tablet. User friendly, easy to use, unobtrusive ads, and makes good use of the screen size. Need more like this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I want to like it
reviews.comment: I love the deseret news, but this app takes FOREVER to reload.. FOREVER. So I uninstalled.
reviews.author: Alexander Aldrich

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Much better than the mobile site which was not attractive at all. Looking forward to using this daily
reviews.author: Tyronne Lavin

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I haven\'t had any problems with it. Keeps me up to date.
reviews.author: Bryson B

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: I have this app on iPad and loved it there. Just as good on Android, if not better. Just because it\'s finally available for Android.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninstalled. Kept force closing and took forever to load.
reviews.comment: Keeps force closing and took forever go load. Not even going to mess with it.
reviews.author: Jack Newman

reviews.title: Too Basic
reviews.comment: I\'m glad they have an app, but no searching capabilities and no access to sections. I can\'t access what I want. It\'s not developed to a point I find it worth anything.
reviews.author: Kyle Wheeler

reviews.comment: Won\'t refresh and very slow on Asus tf201
reviews.author: Blake Hendriksen
